paper_abstract: Interference from other users limits the capacity, and possibly the connectivity, of wireless networks. A simple model of a wireless ad hoc network, in which node locations are described by a homogeneous Poisson point process, and node transmission powers are random, is considered in this paper. A large deviation principle for the interference is presented under different assumptions on the distribution of transmission powers.
paper_title: Large deviations of the interference. in a wireless communication model
